text: Evgeny Donskoy was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Alex Bolt won the title after defeating Hubert Hurkacz 5–7, 7–6(7–4), 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Zhuhai Open - Men's Singles 2018 Men's Singles
title: 2018 Zhuhai Open – Men's Singles
